reviewText: When the Great Depression forces her daddy to seek work far from home, Bonnie overcomes her extreme shyness and works to reunite her family.  Gently narrated by the author, Jo Harper, this iconographic video also includes a Spanish language version.  Ron Mazellan's illustrations and period music complement this moving story.  This DVD was selected by the ALA's Association for Library Service to Children as a 2008 Notable Children's Video!
